data.title: Split 7th Circ. Axes Forced Labor Suit Against Salvation Army
data.meta_description: A group of former participants in the Salvation Army's rehabilitation programs didn't show how the work they performed for the organization represented forced labor, a split Seventh Circuit panel ruled, keeping an Illinois federal court's decision tossing their suit.
